data.title: Elements
authors: Contributors to ROBLOX Elemental grind game wiki

data.text:
Rarities[]

Commons[]

The current Common Elements are: Water, Earth, Lightning, Wood, Light, Dark, Fire, Ice, Wind, Sand, and Poison. Chances of getting a Common is 89.43% because 10% (of uncommon), 0.4% (of Rare), 0,08% (of Legend) and 0,04% (of Myths) sum up to 10.56% and 89.44% plus 10.56% is 100%.

Uncommons[]

The current Uncommon Elements are: Nova, Explosion, Blood, and Metal. Chances of getting an Uncommon is 10% or 1/10.

Rares[]

The current Rare Elements are: Mechanization, Lava, Sound, Chaos, Radiation, Plasma, and Armament. Chances of getting a Rare is 0.4% or 1/250.

Legends[]

The current Legendary Elements are: Lunar, Solar, Phoenix, Hydra, Illusion, Cosmic, and Prism. Chances of getting a Legend is 0.08% or 1/1250.

Mythicals[]

The current Mythical Elements are: Acceleration, Telekinesis, Dragon, Arc of the Elements, Time, Heaven's Wrath, Destruction, Dragon Blade, Necromancer, and Spectre. Chances of getting a Mythical is 0.04% or 1/2500.

EVENT ELEMENTS

The current Event Elements are: Firework, Dullahan, Snow and Krampus All of which are obtained in their seasonal events.

ARENA ELEMENTS

The current Arena Elements are: Demon, which is obtained in the Arena Shop for 1000 Crests.

Trivia[]
